name: boomboxd-backend
description: Music review app with Django backend and React frontend

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && CI= npm run build && cd .. && rm -rf staticfiles && mkdir staticfiles && cp frontend/build/index.html staticfiles/ && cp -r frontend/build/static/* staticfiles/ && cp accounts/static/accounts/default-avatar.svg staticfiles/ && cp music/static/music/default-album.svg staticfiles/
